reviews.text: Came here on a business trip a couple of weeks ago, and was hesitant with the outside location, then we go in and had a real great time with the staff....

A delightful (literally) corner community pub. 
Nate, the owner, treats everyone so kindly. The kitchen makes everything from scratch and it's all worth a try.

A wonderful neighborhood bar tucked away from
the hustle & bustle of High St. Eight and Sand delivers on atmosphere, food & service.

The friendly bartender...
